src:
Here's how Ileana D'Cruz feels after she is done with her work; don't miss the picture!
05 Nov 2019, 16:45 by TIMESOFINDIA.COM
Ileana D'Cruz has been treating her fans with her sensuous pictures on her Instagram. The actress who is currently busy promoting her upcoming film 'Pagalpanti' recently took to the photo-sharing app to share how she feels after she is done with her work for the day.
Sharing a sunkissed photo where she can be seen laying on a bed wearing a robe with her eyes closed. Well, the actress looked absolutely beautiful in the photo even while taking a nap. She captioned the photo, "That feeling when youâ€™re done with work ðŸ–¤". Soon her fans poured in love for the actress in the comment section and praised her beauty.
Check out the post here:



Meanwhile, on the work front, the actress will next be seen in 'Pagalpanti' helmed by Anees Bazmee. Co-starring John Abraham, Anil Kapoor, Kriti Kharbanda, Pulkit Samrat, Arshad Warsi, Saurabh Shukla and more. The film is slated to release on November 22.
